manufacturer: Trails West Manufacturing of Idaho, Inc.

products.manufacturer: Trails West Manufacturing of Idaho, Inc.

summary: THIS IS A HORSE TRAILER. DOORS AND WINDOWS STARTED HAVING ISSUES. THEN WE NOTICE THE FLOOR WARPING. WE CRAWLED UNDER THE TRAILER. STRUCTURAL FAILURE OF THE FRAME NEAR REAR AXLE. FLOOR BECAME WARPED. WE CONTACTED MANUFACTURER WHO ADMITTED A STRUCTURAL DEFECT BUT INFORMED US TRAILER WAS NOT UNDER WARRANTY.  I WAS LUCKY TO HAVE FOUND IT AND NOT LOSE THE AXLE ON THE HIGHWAY WITH A LOAD OF HORSES.
